author: ianna
body:
#### PR description:

DD4hep requires that the detector description logical volumes use valid shapes, e.g. previously defined. 
Reordering the files to comply with this requirement: some boolean shapes defined in `cavern.xml` use shapes defined in `muonBase.xml`

@cvuosalo and @bsunanda - FYI
This PR fixes the problem you've reported yesterday
